summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Review Date: 2020/10/30 Store: Anzuo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} Review Text: I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Review Title: Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count Review Date: 2020/11/20 Store: SOOAE Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Review Title: Great stocking stuffer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Womens’ Metallic Finish Non Slip Grip 48 Counts 2 Inches Hair Bobby Pins Gray Review Date: 2021/01/14 Store: DARONGFENG Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.61 x 2.52 x 0.35 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '788465401296'} Review Text: Good quality bobby pins that hold really well. I haven't seen the gray color in stores so it was really nice that you could order this color on Amazon. Review Title: Great bobby pins, Love that you can get them in the gray color! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK Review Date: 2021/01/14 Store: HAMUULL Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'} Review Text: I love these silicone face scrubbers, they exfoliate the skin so well and are easy to clean. Just place a dab of your favorite facial cleanser on the scrubber and go to work. It helps with creating a rich lather and exfoliating all of the skin. Review Title: Great for exfoliating the skin! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Review Date: 2021/01/28 Store: Anzuo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} Review Text: These gel polish shimmer colors are beautiful and perfect on their own with two coats or over top of a base color coat. They cure easily with a UV light and are chip resistant for almost 2 weeks.

Very durable polish and great selection of colors in this set! Review Title: Great gel polish, perfect shimmer colors to go over a base color coat! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy Review Date: 2021/02/09 Store: AYL Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} Review Text: I have been slowly switching my cleaning products over to more environmentally friendly and wanted to start investing in glass spray bottles and soap dispensers as well. These are just beautiful, the perfect size and came packaged very well to keep the glass from breaking in transit.

These are just as esthetically pleasing as they are practical and I will be purchasing more in the future. I loved the personal touch of the note inside from the seller as I always love to support small businesses. These spray bottles are great if you are in the market do not hesitate to purchase them. Review Title: Beautiful Amber Glass Spray Bottles! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dip Powder Nail Starter Kit 8 Colors Acrylic Dipping Powder System for French Nail Manicure Nail Art Set, Portable Kit for Trave, No LED Nail Lamp Needed… Review Date: 2021/03/03 Store: Colorfairy Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Colorfairy', 'Included Components': 'Dip Powder, Nail Lamp', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 4.17 x 2.72 inches; 9.77 Ounces'} Review Text: Overall this kit worked well, but I will say use the directions shown here online and not the ones on the back of the packaging that this kit comes in. On the instructions posted here it goes over which steps need to be repeated and give more detail.

This stuff is super strong once it is on and my daughter still hasn't been able to remove all of it completely. We are going to have to look up the best removal method for dip powder, but the top coat does dry quickly and is very smooth and shiny.

Looking at the polish you can almost see the granulated powders. It still leaves a pretty finish, but the glitter appears to be more professional looking since you cannot really see that it is a powder underneath the top coat. Review Title: Worked well, but finish is a little different than your normal polish! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 Review Date: 2021/04/28 Store: GERSHION Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} Review Text: I love these spring colors in this assortment of gel polishes! They are super pretty shades and these worked well with my other gel base and top coats. It cured perfectly and has lasted well without chipping/peeling. Review Title: Worked great with my other gel base and top coats! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free Salon Grade (2 x 16.9 fl oz) - Hydrating Toner - Shimmer Correction for Platinum Blonde, Silver, Light, and Grey Hair - New Formula Review Date: 2021/06/14 Store: BELLISSO Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Shine,Restoring,Nourishing', 'Brand': 'BELLISSO', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Scent': 'Green Tea,Natural', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.86 x 6.02 x 3.11 inches; 2.91 Pounds', 'UPC': '765066671129'} Review Text: My daughter has a natural dirty blonde hair color with some blonde balayage mixed in and this purple shampoo and conditioner really helps to keep her blonde from appearing brassy/yellow. Great for twice a week use and maintenance of her color. Love that it is sulfate free and these bottles are large enough that they will last her quite some time. Review Title: Great quality purple shampoo & conditioner for my daughter's naturally blonde hair with highlights! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask | Butt & Thigh Booty Mask | Lightweight Wash Off Type Butt Mask for Cellulite, Stretch Marks, Skin Detox, Ingrown Hairs | Skin Firming and Clearing Booty Mask Formula for Sensitive and All Skin Type | Formulated with Collagen, Rosemary Extract, Centella Asiatica, and Other Natural Ingredients | 100% Natural, Cruelty-free | 2.7 oz Review Date: 2021/06/25 Store: PROOT Product Description: ['Our skin nourishing Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask Mask is power packed with collagen and other natural ingredients. Its innovative and natural booty masking formula is infused with collagen and centella asiatica extracts to give your booty super supple and clear booty complexion.', 'Our skin nourishing Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask Mask is power packed with collagen and other natural ingredients. Its innovative and natural booty masking formula is infused with collagen and centella asiatica extracts to give your booty super supple and clear booty complexion.', 'Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask works to gently detoxify and purify skin by drawing out impurities, oil and environmental toxins.', 'Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask works to gently detoxify and purify skin by drawing out impurities, oil and environmental toxins.', 'Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance and stabilizers, our booty mask is packed with natural and innovative formula that helps reduce fine lines and cellulite, replenish moisture levels and relieve dryness.', 'Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance and stabilizers, our booty mask is packed with natural and innovative formula that helps reduce fine lines and cellulite, replenish moisture levels and relieve dryness.', 'Suitable for all skin types.', 'Suitable for all skin types.', 'No paraben, No silicones, No animal tests, No artificial color', 'No paraben, No silicones, No animal tests, No artificial color', 'Dermatologist tested, Gentle on sensitive skin.', 'Dermatologist tested, Gentle on sensitive skin.', '2.7 fl.oz', '2.7 fl.oz', 'Directions: On clean & dry skin, apply a thing layer to your booty for 15-20 minutes. After masking, please wipe the mask with a towel or wash off in a shower. Use 2-3x per week.', 'Directions', ': On clean & dry skin, apply a thing layer to your booty for 15-20 minutes. After masking, please wipe the mask with a towel or wash off in a shower. Use 2-3x per week.', 'Ingredients: Water, Kaolin, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Beeswax, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Polysorbate 60, Bentonite, Vinyl Dimethicone, Polyglutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract,Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Carbomer, Arginine, Fast Acid Magenta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Allantoin, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA', 'Ingredients', ': Water, Kaolin, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Beeswax, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Polysorbate 60, Bentonite, Vinyl Dimethicone, Polyglutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract,Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Carbomer, Arginine, Fast Acid Magenta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Allantoin, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Butt Mask', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Sensitive, Dry, Normal', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.4 x 6 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: This clarifying mask makes your skin feel smoother, but as far as clearing acne on your inner thighs or lightening dark spots it doesn't help at all. I've been using it regularly for 2 week now with no improvement. It does make your skin feel soft and smooth so maybe better used for smoothing the buttocks. Review Title: Doesn't help clear inner thigh acne or lighten dark spots as I was expecting! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, 2pcs Waterproof Mascara & Fiber Set, Longer Thicker Voluminous Eyelashes, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day Review Date: 2021/08/03 Store: Arlega+ Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'Arlega+', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 2.8 x 1.06 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '193995030692 193995032320'} Review Text: This mascara makes my lashes look voluminous without clumping and is easy to wash off, but also provides great waterproof coverage. It is easy to apply and looks beautiful, I like to use the fiber when I'm really wanting fuller voluminous lashes like for date night or a special occasion. Review Title: Works great as only a mascara or along with the fiber that is included! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Back Acne Treatment Spray | Bacne Cure Treatment Spray | Clears Back Acne, Body Acne, Chest Acne, Butt Acne, Ingrown Hairs & Razor Bumps | Formulated with Natural Ingredients, Cruelty-free | 5.1 oz Review Date: 2021/08/09 Store: PROOT Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'mist', 'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Item Volume': '5.1 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7 inches; 7.48 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: My teen daughter has hormonal acne all over her back, chest and shoulders. This spray is perfect as she can apply it herself daily after showering. It has improved the clarity of her skin and reduced redness as well without over drying her skin. Review Title: Great for my teen daughters Bacne! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz Review Date: 2021/09/27 Store: Gryph & IvyRose Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'} Review Text: My youngest daughter has Eczema and struggles with dry itchy skin. This lotion worked well at keeping her skin hydrated, without causing any irritation. We have also ordered the Gryph & IvyRose Shampoo & Conditioner and it works well for her also. Love this brand!! Review Title: Great for my daughter with eczema! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Not My Mama's Deodorizing Body Lotion for Kids - All Natural, Lemon Creme Scent, 8 oz. Review Date: 2021/10/06 Store: Not My Mama's Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': "Not My Mama's", 'Scent': 'Lemon', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 2.13 x 1.77 inches; 9.7 Ounces'} Review Text: My 9 year old daughter has rough and bumpy skin so we go through a lot of lotion trying to keep it hydrated. This lotion works well at not irritating her skin and hydrating it to keep it soft and smooth. It even came with a cute little sticker that she put on her water bottle. Love that it came with the pump as kids are messy with squirt bottles. Cannot say enough great things about this lotion the scent was subtle and refreshing not too overbearing! Review Title: Great for my 9 year old that has rough and bumpy skin! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Doesn't help clear inner thigh acne or lighten dark spots as I was expecting! 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, 2pcs Waterproof Mascara & Fiber Set, Longer Thicker Voluminous Eyelashes, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day Arlega+ {'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'Arlega+', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 2.8 x 1.06 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '193995030692 193995032320'} This mascara makes my lashes look voluminous without clumping and is easy to wash off, but also provides great waterproof coverage. It is easy to apply and looks beautiful, I like to use the fiber when I'm really wanting fuller voluminous lashes like for date night or a special occasion. Works great as only a mascara or along with the fiber that is included! Back Acne Treatment Spray | Bacne Cure Treatment Spray | Clears Back Acne, Body Acne, Chest Acne, Butt Acne, Ingrown Hairs & Razor Bumps | Formulated with Natural Ingredients, Cruelty-free | 5.1 oz PROOT {'Item Form': 'mist', 'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Item Volume': '5.1 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7 inches; 7.48 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} My teen daughter has hormonal acne all over her back, chest and shoulders. Great for my teen daughters Bacne! Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz Gryph & IvyRose {'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'} My youngest daughter has Eczema and struggles with dry itchy skin. Great for my daughter with eczema! Not My Mama's Deodorizing Body Lotion for Kids - All Natural, Lemon Creme Scent, 8 oz. Not My Mama's {'Brand': "Not My Mama's", 'Scent': 'Lemon', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 2.13 x 1.77 inches; 9.7 Ounces'} My 9 year old daughter has rough and bumpy skin so we go through a lot of lotion trying to keep it hydrated. This lotion works well at not irritating her skin and hydrating it to keep it soft and smooth. It even came with a cute little sticker that she put on her water bottle. prompt:
Based on this purchase history, summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Review Date: 2020/10/30 Store: Anzuo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} Review Text: I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Review Title: Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count Review Date: 2020/11/20 Store: SOOAE Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Review Title: Great stocking stuffer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Womens’ Metallic Finish Non Slip Grip 48 Counts 2 Inches Hair Bobby Pins Gray Review Date: 2021/01/14 Store: DARONGFENG Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.61 x 2.52 x 0.35 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '788465401296'} Review Text: Good quality bobby pins that hold really well. I haven't seen the gray color in stores so it was really nice that you could order this color on Amazon. Review Title: Great bobby pins, Love that you can get them in the gray color! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK Review Date: 2021/01/14 Store: HAMUULL Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'} Review Text: I love these silicone face scrubbers, they exfoliate the skin so well and are easy to clean. Just place a dab of your favorite facial cleanser on the scrubber and go to work. It helps with creating a rich lather and exfoliating all of the skin. Review Title: Great for exfoliating the skin! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Review Date: 2021/01/28 Store: Anzuo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} Review Text: These gel polish shimmer colors are beautiful and perfect on their own with two coats or over top of a base color coat. They cure easily with a UV light and are chip resistant for almost 2 weeks.

Very durable polish and great selection of colors in this set! Review Title: Great gel polish, perfect shimmer colors to go over a base color coat! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy Review Date: 2021/02/09 Store: AYL Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} Review Text: I have been slowly switching my cleaning products over to more environmentally friendly and wanted to start investing in glass spray bottles and soap dispensers as well. These are just beautiful, the perfect size and came packaged very well to keep the glass from breaking in transit.

These are just as esthetically pleasing as they are practical and I will be purchasing more in the future. I loved the personal touch of the note inside from the seller as I always love to support small businesses. These spray bottles are great if you are in the market do not hesitate to purchase them. Review Title: Beautiful Amber Glass Spray Bottles! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dip Powder Nail Starter Kit 8 Colors Acrylic Dipping Powder System for French Nail Manicure Nail Art Set, Portable Kit for Trave, No LED Nail Lamp Needed… Review Date: 2021/03/03 Store: Colorfairy Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Colorfairy', 'Included Components': 'Dip Powder, Nail Lamp', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 4.17 x 2.72 inches; 9.77 Ounces'} Review Text: Overall this kit worked well, but I will say use the directions shown here online and not the ones on the back of the packaging that this kit comes in. On the instructions posted here it goes over which steps need to be repeated and give more detail.

This stuff is super strong once it is on and my daughter still hasn't been able to remove all of it completely. We are going to have to look up the best removal method for dip powder, but the top coat does dry quickly and is very smooth and shiny.

Looking at the polish you can almost see the granulated powders. It still leaves a pretty finish, but the glitter appears to be more professional looking since you cannot really see that it is a powder underneath the top coat. Review Title: Worked well, but finish is a little different than your normal polish! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 Review Date: 2021/04/28 Store: GERSHION Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} Review Text: I love these spring colors in this assortment of gel polishes! They are super pretty shades and these worked well with my other gel base and top coats. It cured perfectly and has lasted well without chipping/peeling. Review Title: Worked great with my other gel base and top coats! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free Salon Grade (2 x 16.9 fl oz) - Hydrating Toner - Shimmer Correction for Platinum Blonde, Silver, Light, and Grey Hair - New Formula Review Date: 2021/06/14 Store: BELLISSO Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Shine,Restoring,Nourishing', 'Brand': 'BELLISSO', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Scent': 'Green Tea,Natural', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.86 x 6.02 x 3.11 inches; 2.91 Pounds', 'UPC': '765066671129'} Review Text: My daughter has a natural dirty blonde hair color with some blonde balayage mixed in and this purple shampoo and conditioner really helps to keep her blonde from appearing brassy/yellow. raw_response:
**Key Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Nail Care Products**: Consistent purchases indicate a strong preference for gel nail polish and manicuring kits, emphasizing durability, color variety, and ease of use—highlighting a DIY approach to nail art.

2. **Skincare for Family**: The individual frequently shops for skincare products for both themselves and their children, focusing on gentle, natural, and cruelty-free formulations suitable for sensitive skin or specific conditions (e.g., eczema).

3. **Hair Care**: Interest in hair care products is noted, specifically items that cater to color maintenance and hydration, showing a focus on maintaining healthy hair and preventing issues like brassiness.

4. **Eco-Friendly Alternatives**: There's a notable trend towards purchasing eco-friendly and reusable products, like glass spray bottles, indicating a preference for sustainable goods.

5. **Beauty Tools**: The consumer shows enthusiasm for functional beauty tools such as cleansing brushes and mascara that enhance cosmetic application, suggesting an appreciation for effective beauty routines.

6. **Gifting Considerations**: The intention behind some purchases hints at a thoughtful gifting strategy, often related to beauty and personal care items aimed at family and friends.

Overall, the shopper prioritizes effective, quality products that support beauty and skincare, reflecting a balance between personal indulgence and caring for family needs.

target_interaction.title: Love these sectioning clips when curling my hair, enough in the pack for me and my daughter!
target_interaction.text: I love lange products and these clips are no exception. I use them when styling my hair and they work well to keep sections secured while curling or straightening hair.
target_interaction.title_meta: L'ANGE HAIR Rubber Sectioning Hair Clips | Narrow-Tipped Design | For Parting & Sectioning Hair | Easy Grip Handles | Professional Styling Results | 6-Pack (Blush)
features: NARROW-TIPPED DESIGN – Creating smooth, even parts and sections has never been easier! Narrow pointed tips ensure precision parting for polished, professional-looking results.
HELPFUL HAIR ACCESSORIES – Section and secure your hair so you can work in smaller, more manageable sections. Enjoy easy, precise styling for those salon-quality results you’re looking for.

NON-SLIP GRIPS - Working with damp hair while juggling various brushes and products can make styling difficult. Textured grips make these sectioning clips easy to grasp and open the jaws for easy, carefree styling.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE – These L’ange Sectioning Hair Clips gently and effectively keep your hair pulled back when you need it. They’re designed to withstand repeated use without pulling, snagging, or creating hair creases.
RISK-FREE MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE – Your satisfaction and positive experience is our #1 priority. Contact us for a hassle-free return if you’re not happy with your purchase.

videos.title: Great quality clips. Grippy and strong.
